title: @Meddler: Will Skarners become more unique?
body:
Currently Skarner is awfully plain. 

Passive: Sort of unique, requires spells to get stacks on. 

Q: AOE damage

W: Just a shield and speed up

E: Just a slow and does nothing else

R: Warwick type ult but allows you to reposition the enemy, kind of unique.


It would be nice if his spells had passives or other ablities, or fun things like bards q which is a slow but it can be a stun if it hits something else. The previous rework skarner had really took away a lot of his fun. 

I just want skar skar to be fun to play, for me and the enemy.

replies.body: This is actually the major goal of the upcoming changes. Giving him some totally new things to bring to his team/the game.

Will we also get a more flesh out lore on his page like MF, TF, GP, and Graves got this past couple of weeks? 

Also...and this is a big question I had for a while: New champion spotlight?

For expanded lore, yes at some point. I don't know the exact dates though (not on the narrative team sry). 

Don't think there's a new champ spotlight in the works right now but I know they would like to redo the one's for reworked champs when they have the time.
Small question. Will Skarner still be able to carry games if ahead? Because currently Skarner can snowball really hard.
Yea these type of immobile bruisers (morde, skar, darius, garen) should reach pretty carry status with the amount of tankiness and damage they need to make up for their lack of mobility or CC tools.

Your one of my favorite rioters. All your post are very informative. Thank you.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotScruffy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XMxmbM5b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-01T05:23:38.193+0000)
>
> This is actually the major goal of the upcoming changes. Giving him some totally new things to bring to his team/the game.

Here's my suggestion:

Passive: Each auto attack decreases his cool downs by 0.5 seconds. 1 second against champions.

Q: Just like Live Q, except it also cleaves the area in front of him. Attack speed buff removed. Each time he auto attacks with a charged Q, his auto attacks increase his movement speed and deal additional magic damage. His claws glow for a reason.

W: Now increases attack speed for several seconds even if the shield breaks.

E: Slows the target and marks them, causing his Crystal Slashes to heal a small % of his HP every time he Q's them.

R: Same as live except his Crystal Slashes still proc on the target.

W: The part of even if the shield breaks has very little counterplay besides running away till the buff wears out. I think it shouldnt apply if the shield breaks. Since currently, if skarner is gaining on you, its better to stop, shoot him with everything and then keep running. 

E: Basically the old E xD
I just want his Cool down reduced per attack to affect all his skills  again.
Skarner is fun to play

I still miss his ability to E mark then Q heal for farming/team fighting.

His W and Q have always been bland abilities.

The Scorpion should be feared for his sting, not his thrashing about.  More stinging, less thrashing!
It would be cool if Skarner's Passive was more of a mini-ultimate and then free up his R. So instead of stunning on passive, he drags the enemy for the duration instead.
